Headline: #78 Montrose  Eastbound Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Marine Dr
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/115th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 115th, Emerald,113th and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 115th, Emerald,113th and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/115th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
